name: Red Alliance
description: Red Alliance is an atmospheric, dark action thriller single player game with elements of horror. The game takes place in Eastern Europe where the society is under oppressive regime enforced by a mysterious scientist whom the player must stop to restore justice.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10, Windows 8.1, Windows 8, Windows 7 Service Pack 1, Windows Vista Service Pack 2* (*NVIDIA video card recommended if running Vista OS) Processor: Intel® Core™2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4600 / NVIDIA 9800 GT 1GB / AMD HD 4870 1GB DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX 10 compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64-Bit, Windows 8.1 64-Bit, Windows 8 64-Bit, Windows 7 64-Bit Service Pack 1 Processor: Intel Core i5 3470 @ 3.2GHz (4 CPUs) / AMD X8 FX-8350 @ 4GHz (8 CPUs) Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 2GB / AMD HD 7870 2GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX 10 compatible
